title: The English opera, or, The vocal musick in Psyche with the instrumental therein intermix'd : to which is adjoyned the instrumental musick in The tempest / by Matthew Lock ...
author: Locke, Matthew, 1621 or 2-1677.
publisher: Printed by T. Ratcliff and N. Thompson for the author, and are to be sold by John Carr at his shop ...,
notes: The text is from Shadwell's tragedy, Psyche.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
"The instrumental musick used in The tempest": p. 62-72 [i.e. 76].
